Author: ilikefoodandwaater
Text: Thank you for your advice! I think I'll cook more meals. Now that you bring it up, she does eat when I cook meals.

Author: O_O--ohboy
Text: I have found that it's a lot easier for me to eat when with my bestie -- she makes me all happy and relaxed and then her SO cooks for us and when I'm with her it's like I don't need to create my worth by starving. She struggles with ED too and eats with me and it helps.
